main.name: Heriberto Torres
main.description: enjoys programming, technology, learning new skills, and mastering existing ones
main.bio: Since I had first been exposed to programming years ago, I knew that this was my life purpose. I studied relentlessly day in and day out to learn and grasp new skils and concepts. Soon after, I had decided to pursue a bachelor's in Computer Science where I had learned much about programming theory as well as different aspects of software development, mobile application development, and web development. Later, I decided to attend a web development bootcamp at Coding Dojo to aquire knowledge on current technologies used in the field. I have continued to practice and learn new concepts ever since. I am passionate about programming and will continue to strive for excellence and mastery of the technologies utilized.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

projects.title: Netflix Clone
projects.category: React project with a front-end design based on Netflix. Integrates the TMDb third-party API using Axios to fetch json results which are used to display categories of movies as well as respective posters, backdrops, and YouTube trailers where applicable.

projects.title: Discord Clone
projects.category: Full stack web application using the MERN solution. Discord based community messaging application utilizing chat channels with web sockets. Front end features React-Redux, Axios, & Material-UI. Back end includes bcyrpt, cors, jsonwebtoken, & cookie-parser among other tools & technologies.

projects.title: Void Tech Systems
projects.category: An E-Commerce site built using Django & Python featuring AJAX to search and display database results, manages multiple relational models, uses mobile friendly design, and implements bootstrap among a variety of other concepts. Features user authentication & authorization along with wish lists and carts to manage customer product selection.
